title: Genesis: An Anthology of Black Science Fiction
description: Within these pages you will delve into the worlds of science fiction, speculative fiction, horror and fantasy. Writers who are both seasoned and up and coming, African American, as well as from the African Diaspora contributed more than 20 pieces of the most entertaining, eclectic, and enthralling stories that will cature your imagination.Featured authors include: Linda Addison, Charles Saunders, Edward Uzzle, Milton Davis, B. Sharise Moore, Carole McDonnell, Valjeanne Jeffers and many more.
author: Milton J. Davis
